messages.subject: Re: Fw: "Rod" news - AMAZON
messages.msgSnippet: I used to have a friend who would go to the used bookstores in ... shred ... going to ... Thanks for this nice thought...I can hope, I guess...  I had never
messages.messageBody:
I used to have a friend who would go to the used bookstores in
> town and purchase all the Babywise and GKGW and Pearl books and then
shred
> them and put them in her compost bin! She said at least they were
going to
> some good now. So maybe it was someone like her who bought it. :)

Thanks for this nice thought...I can hope, I guess... I had never
read any of these books or read anything about them until this recent
incident about them. I have read excerpts from most of them now, and
I have to say, they turn my stomach. I will be on the lookout for
them now, too, and dispose of them properly.
Thanks for the encouragement...I needed it.
Paige

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Fw: "Rod" news - AMAZON
messages.msgSnippet: ... Maybe someone bought it to keep it out of the hands of someone who might just use it.  I used to have a friend who would go to the used bookstores in town
messages.messageBody:
On 3/31/06, Paige <paigehughes1972@...> wrote:
>
> 'Shepherding a
> > Child's Heart' by Tripp, All 4 of these books recommend hitting
> > infants under 1 year of age, with sticks and whips.
>
>
>
> AAARRRGGHHH!! I sold this book on e-bay! I just picked it up
> somewhere...a book sale or something...and re-sold it without reading
> it...AAARRRGGGHHH!!!! Boy, I wish I hadn't done that! Bleah. Now my
> day will be ruined, thinking of what I might have caused...bleah.
> :(
> Paige


Maybe someone bought it to keep it out of the hands of someone who might
just use it. I used to have a friend who would go to the used bookstores in
town and purchase all the Babywise and GKGW and Pearl books and then shred
them and put them in her compost bin! She said at least they were going to
some good now. So maybe it was someone like her who bought it. :)





--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr
Catch our new wave of color!
Book a March show!

messages.messageBody:
'Shepherding a
> Child's Heart' by Tripp, All 4 of these books recommend hitting
> infants under 1 year of age, with sticks and whips.



AAARRRGGHHH!! I sold this book on e-bay! I just picked it up
somewhere...a book sale or something...and re-sold it without reading
it...AAARRRGGGHHH!!!! Boy, I wish I hadn't done that! Bleah. Now my
day will be ruined, thinking of what I might have caused...bleah.
:(
Paige

messages.subject: Fw: "Rod" news - AMAZON
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: The Lawrences Date: 03/31/06 06:13:48 To: rodlist Subject: Rod news - AMAZON Dear Friends, Well the campaign against Amazon is in full swing!
messages.messageBody:
-------Original Message-------

From: The Lawrences
Date: 03/31/06 06:13:48
To: rodlist
Subject: "Rod" news - AMAZON

Dear Friends,

Well the campaign against Amazon is in full swing! Thanks to everyone
who wrote them last week, asking them to remove 4 baby-whipping books
from their website. Let's keep the pressure on!

Please call them at (800) 201-7575 within the US, or
(877) 586-3230 for Canada, or
0800 279 6629, United Kingdom.

Politely say "Please stop selling baby-whipping books. Making money by
selling books such as 'To Train Up a Child' by Pearl, 'Shepherding a
Child's Heart' by Tripp, 'What the Bible Says About Child Training' by
Fugate, and 'Child Training Tips' by Bradley is unethical and only
encourages blatant child abuse. All 4 of these books recommend hitting
infants under 1 year of age, with sticks and whips. Following the advice
in these books has resulted in serious charges of child abuse. Until you
stop selling these child abuse manuals, I will not purchase items from
Amazon."

You can also complain about these books by writing a comment in the box
at the bottom of this page (scroll down to *Comments or Examples* ):
http://www.amazon
com/gp/product/1889700134/sr=8-1/qid=1143768444/ref=pd_bbs_1/103-6927145-3455
10?%5Fencoding=UTF8

And here is an action page set up by someone on this list (thank you!)
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LittleChildren/message/1

Also, please write a review of "What the Bible Says About Child
Training" if you haven't yet
http://www.stoptherod.net/biblical-child-training-excerpt.html

Thank you everyone, for speaking out against these outrageous books!!

Susan Lawrence
http://stoptherod.net
http://parentinginjesusfootsteps.org
*********************************************************************
OTHER NEWS
Corporal punishment in the news again: http://nospank.net/n-p88r.htm
*********************************************************************
It is through a wholesome discontent with things as they are, that we
ever try to make them any better. Susan B. Anthony
_____________________________________________________________________

This list will never be sold, rented, traded or given to anyone.

To unsubscribe from this list, or change the email address where you receive
messages,
please go to http://v2.listbox.com/member/?listname=stoptherod@...
